A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie did so much irreversible damage to the Star Wars series by essentially demolishing everything that the Original Trilogy established about The Force. There were 3 plot lines all happening at the same time\, coupled with bad pacing and less than good acting. This movie takes no risks whatsoever\, and chooses to play it safe. Also worth noting\, much like The Force Awakens was to A New Hope\, this movie is a re-hash of Empire Strikes Back. There’s enjoyable moments\, but overall it’s a bad movie
